short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clickable mini maps, maps menu is back, open maps buttons everywhere in Google search. Right click search and map links history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension designed to enhance your Google Search experience. 

For OPERA users: After installing this extension, you need to enable the "Allow access to search page results" option in the extension settings.

It restores the clickable functionality to mini maps within search results and reinstates the top Maps menu for easy access. Moreover, it introduces convenient Open Map buttons, ensuring a user-friendly pathway to explore maps. With the added feature of searching in Google Maps directly from selected text via a right-click menu, navigating through maps has never been easier. 

1.1.3
- Maps link fixed in the top bar on google.ru and other sites.

-  Map button icon fixed under the minimap.

- Extra rotated call button fix

1.1.0
